text: This is a list of the mountains in the Andes that are at least high. The Andes are the longest exposed mountain range of the world, and the second-highest after the Himalayas. The Andes mountain range is also the highest mountain range outside Asia. == List == Mountains of the Andes Elevation Name Range Coordinates Image Country 6,961 Aconcagua Principal Cordillera 6,893
